Parameters.Value:
File Action Test Configuration:
	1. Prompt for Image File -> Hit Submit [frmImage,Form]
	2. If [frmImage.Length,Form] > 0
		2.1. Save Image to Folder File.Action.Test/2.1/Image.jpg
			2.1.1 Check to see if File.Action.Test/2.1/Image.jpg Exists
				2.1.1.1 If Yes, Append 1 to Result, else Append 0 to Result
		2.2. Copy Image to Folder File.Action.Test/2.2
			2.2.1 Check to see if File.Action.Test/2.2/Image.jpg Exists
				2.2.1.1 If Yes, Append 1 to Result, else Append 0 to Result
		2.3. Move File.Action.Test/2.1/Image.jpg to File.Action.Test/2.3/Image.jpg
			2.3.1 Check to see if File.Action.Test/2.3/Image.jpg Exists
				2.3.1.1 If Yes, Append 1 to Result, else Append 0 to Result
		2.4 Copy File.Action.Test/2.3/Image.jpg to File.Action.Test/2.4/Image.jpg
		2.5 Delete File.Action.Test/2.4/Image.jpg
			2.5.1 Check to see if File.Action.Test/2.4/Image.jpg Exists
				2.5.1.1 If Yes, Append 0 to Result, else Append 1 to Result
		2.6 Delete File.Action.Test/2.4
			2.6.1 Check to see if File.Action.Test/2.4 Exists
				2.6.1.1 If Yes, Append 0 to Result, else Append 1 to Result
		2.7 Image Transform Image
			2.7.1 Image Transform (100px Width), saved as File.Action.Test/2.7/Image.100Wide.jpg
			2.7.2 Image Transform (100px Tall), Save as File.Action.Test/2.7/Image.100Tall.jpg
			2.7.3 Image Transform (100px/100px), Save as File.Action.Test/2.7/Image.100By100.jpg
			2.7.4 Check to see if files for File.Action.Test/2.7 Exist
				2.7.4.1 If Yes, Append 1 to Result, else Append 0 to Result
		2.8 Compress Files from File.Action.Test/2.7/ into File.Action.Test/2.8/Compressed.Images.zip
			2.8.1 Check to see if file for File.Action.Test/2.8/Compressed.Images.zip Exists
				2.8.1.1 If Yes, Append 1 to Result, else Append 0 to Result
		2.9 Extract Files from File.Action.Test/2.8 into File.Action.Test/2.9
			2.9.1 Check to see if file for File.Action.Test/2.9 Exists
				2.9.1.1 If Yes, Append 1 to Result, else Append 0 to Result
		2.10 Check to see if the table File_Action_Test_2_10 Exists, if not - create it and insert 100 records.
			2.10.1 Check to see if table Exists
				2.10.1.1 If Yes, Append 1 to Result, else Append 0 to Result
		2.11 SQL->CSV Target of File.Action.Test/2.11/File.Action.Test.2.11.csv from table File_Action_Test_2_10
			2.11.1 Check to see if file Exists
				2.11.1.1 If Yes, Append 1 to Result, else Append 0 to Result
		2.12 Get the result of the sum of the table into an action variable TABLESUM. Drop the table File_Action_Test_2_10
			2.12.1 Check to see if table Exists
				2.12.1.1 If Yes, Append 0 to Result, else Append 1 to Result
		2.13 Check to see if table File_Action_Test_13 Exists, if not create it.
		2.14 CSV->SQL from File.Action.Test/2.11/File.Action.Test.2.11.csv into File_Action_Test_13
			2.14.1 Check to see if table record count is 100 and sum is TABLESUM.
				2.14.1.1 If Yes, Append 1 to Result, else Append 0 to Result
		2.15 Create table File_Action_Test_15
		2.16 SQL->SQL from File_Action_Test_13 into File_Action_Test_15
			2.16.1 Check to see if table record count is 100 and sum is TABLESUM.
				2.16.1.1 If Yes, Append 1 to Result, else Append 0 to Result		
		2.17 Generate HTML Result 
		2.18 Store HTML Result into file File.Action.Test/Results.html
		2.19 Compress Folder File.Action.Test into Action variable ResultFile
		2.20 Delete Folder File.Action.Test
		2.21 Delete tables File_Action_Test_13 and File_Action_Test_15
		2.22 Get Action File FileResult, write into Response as Test.Results.zip
	3. Optionally - send results of test to r2i Webservice.

To test the full functionality of the Action engine within Open Web Studio, the following process is executed....
Please provide an image file that is wider and taller than 100 pixels by 100 pixels.

Image File:
Display Name:
First Name:
Last Name:
Password:
Email Address:
Region:
City:
Cell Phone:
Address:
Biography:{TEXTEDITOR,"frmBiography",frmBiography,Form,"100%","400"}

Parameters.Query:
if exists (select top 1 * from sysobjects where name = 'File_Action_Test_2_10' and xtype = 'U')
	drop table File_Action_Test_2_10

Create table File_Action_Test_2_10(TestID int identity(1,1),StartDate datetime, EndDate datetime, Username varchar(100),PortalID varchar(50), ModuleID varchar(50), TabID varchar(50))

declare @i integer
set @i = 0
while @i < 200
begin
	Insert into File_Action_Test_2_10(StartDate,EndDate,Username,PortalID,ModuleID,TabID)
	Values (getdate(),getdate(),@Username,@PortalID,@ModuleID,@TabID)
	set @i = @i + 1
end
UPDATE File_Action_Test_2_10 Set EndDate = getdate()
select sum(TestID) TABLESUM from File_Action_Test_2_10

Parameters.DestinationQuery:
INSERT INTO File_Action_Test_2_13(TestID,StartDate, EndDate, Username,PortalID, ModuleID, TabID)
VALUES (@TestID,@StartDate,@EndDate,@iUsername,@iPortalID,@iModuleID,@iTabID)

INSERT INTO File_Action_Test_2_14(TestID,StartDate, EndDate, Username,PortalID, ModuleID, TabID)
VALUES (@TestID,@StartDate,@EndDate,@iUsername,@iPortalID,@iModuleID,@iTabID)
